ticket.title: [PATCH] Add :notice, :alert, and :flash as options to render.
ticket.original-body:
DHH added :notice, :alert and :flash as options to redirect_to, each of which set the flash hash before performing the redirect:
http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/e6cadd422b72ba9818cc2f3b22243a6aa754c9f8
This patch gives the same options to render, setting values in flash.now. This gives the rendering/redirecting api some consistency. Tests are included, and everything passes on master.

ticket.original-body-html:
DHH added :notice, :alert and :flash as options to redirect_to, each of which set the flash hash before performing the redirect:

http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/e6cadd422b72ba9818cc2f3b22243a...

This patch gives the same options to render, setting values in flash.now. This gives the rendering/redirecting api some consistency. Tests are included, and everything passes on master.

http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/e6cadd422b72ba9818cc2f3b22243a...

This patch gives the same options to render, setting values in flash.now. This gives the rendering/redirecting api some consistency. Tests are included, and everything passes on master.
version.title: [PATCH] Add :notice, :alert, and :flash as options to render.

version.body: Thanks for your patch but tendering flash.now messages with a template is not a common pattern in most Rails applications. That said, I would prefer to leave the rendering stack simpler without need to check for extra flash keys.
version.body-html: Thanks for your patch but tendering flash.now messages with a template is not a common pattern in most Rails applications. That said, I would prefer to leave the rendering stack simpler without need to check for extra flash keys.
version.title: [PATCH] Add :notice, :alert, and :flash as options to render.

version.body: Any chance of reconsidering? This may a worthy addition. Flashing notices while rendering is I believe not uncommon (since it usually mean recycling the page due to an error). It also adds consistency between redirect_to and render.
version.body-html: Any chance of reconsidering? This may a worthy addition. Flashing notices while rendering is I believe not uncommon (since it usually mean recycling the page due to an error). It also adds consistency between redirect_to and render.
version.title: [PATCH] Add :notice, :alert, and :flash as options to render.

version.body: This supra footwear is called a modern vintage and has been since their introduction in 2003 where they began in Europe. Every supra shoes has some type of ornament, adornment or hardware and is comprised of aged leather that is bought from around the world. These supra uk are culturally engaging and allow for the woman wearing them to be enveloped in luxury.With new cuts and styles and hand stitched shoes, these timberland boots, heels or flats will make every foot look like it stepped out of vintage Hollywood. This timberland shoes have been worn and coveted by many of the most famous females in recent history. One such coach outlet, Jennifer Aniston, wears them in public and at home.This company makes many different unique styles of bags outlet from ankle booties to sandals, pumps, moncler jackets online, platforms and wedges. One louis vuitton bag in particular is ideal for the gothic style sense; it is patent leather and laces up the front of the shaft. There are also zippers on each side, and this shoe offers a flat heel of a half inch.Another great moncler jackets sale is featured in People's Style Watch and is called a platform bootie. This ture religion jeans has a raised panel in front of the ankle as well as a heel that measures 4.5 inches. The front offers a leather bandage appearance and is considered high fashion.
